comment_body:
I like conversation only text like this, but did you know if you are doing a talk only thing there are several nice things you can do with dialogue, like a hidden conversation inside the text.

Like, instead of one guy being the one pushing the wierd conspiracy and other being reluctant, why not the 2 discussion the weird even but none being really interested... Settings a bleak tone and sad vibes... 

Dunno, just my thoughts, i also dont know too much on how to do this, just the theory.
